affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.
notes:
Deals damage every 0.7 seconds.
Remains active if Clockwerk is disabled.
Total damage: 320/640/960/1280
cmb:
75/75/75/75
32/28/24/20
lore: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.
name: rattletrap_battery_assault

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
cmb:
50/60/70/80
15
lore: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.
name: rattletrap_power_cogs

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.
cmb:
50/50/50/50
20/18/16/14
lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
name: rattletrap_rocket_flare

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location. If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage. Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Hookshot will latch and take Clockwerk to allies, but not damage or disable them.
Hookshot's pull and stun pierce magic immunity. The damage does not.
cmb:
150/150/150
70/55/40
lore: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.
name: rattletrap_hookshot
